SELECT
from projects p left join program_projects pp on p.id = pp.program_id and pp.deleted_at = '1970-01-01 00:00:00'
inner join project_members pm on pm.project_id = p.id and pm.deleted_at = '1970-01-01 00:00:00' and pm.user_id = #{userId}
and pm.type >= 90
left join project_recent_views prv on pm.project_id = prv.project_id and pm.user_id = prv.user_id and prv.deleted_at ='1970-01-01 00:00:00'
inner join project_members pmm on pmm.project_id = p.id and pmm.deleted_at = '1970-01-01 00:00:00'
where p.team_owner_id = #{teamId} and p.deleted_at = #{deletedAt} and p.pm_type = 1
and pmm.type = 100 and pmm.user_id in
#{userId}
and pp.project_id in
#{projectId}
and p.start_date >= #{startDate}
and p.end_date <= #{endDate}
and ( p.name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or p.name_pinyin like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or p.display_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') )
group by p.id order by
p.created_at
p.start_date
prv.updated_at
convert(p.display_name using gbk)
desc ,
asc ,
p.id desc
